titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to index the basis of certain assets for purposes of determining gain.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/21/1994--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require indexing, based on the consumer price index, of the adjusted basis of certain assets (corporate stock and tangible property that is a capital asset of property used in a trade or business) that have been held for more than one year at the time of sale or other transfer, solely for the purpose of determining gain or loss.
